title: Issue with downloading League (Mac, don't hate... its all i have)
body: After the most recent patch update thing (yesterday morning?.... i think) league has not been working for me. When tried updating it, however after the download it said something was wrong. I decided to delete league and re-download it. Unfortunately, league will not download completely for me. After opening it in applications and downloading this first part there are not issues. The issue arises when i try open client. When i click on the league of legends folder thingy the icon appears slightly in the toolbar...bounces a couple times then disappears.... Another help would be really appreciated. Thank you. Sorry for the bad English.

replies.body: this is happening to me as well but i have a pc so i don't really care. feels bad man
